conversations.body_text:
Hello,

This package has not been delivered and was returned to sender. Please re-ship the package or send a replacement order at no charge ASAP. I am super aggravated with the customer support I've received with this issue.

Thank you,

Hi Brendan Granitski,    I apologize for not responding to you promptly. Please confirm your address as soon as possible, and we will reship your order.  Jennifer Granitski  2489 Lineberry Lane  Malabar, FL 32950  United States  +1 321-298-7918
